dtliExcerpt: The fact that the new Broadway show did away with the movie’s super campy opener of Meryl Streep’s “Me” — the film's only musical number, incidentally — and replaced it with the even campier “For the Gaze” tells you everything you need to know about the new production and its mission to go bigger and bawdier at every turn.
